Uses of Class
cards.AnswerCard

  • Packages that use AnswerCard 
    Package Description
    cards
    Contains the classes that deal with cards and decks in Cards Against Humanity.
    game
    Contains classes that have to do with the actual game of Cards Against Humanity itself.
    ui
    The package that has to do with the user interface for Cards Against Humanity.
    users
    The package that contains the classes that have to do with users, user information, and keeping records on users so that they can be impersonated by the computer.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AnswerCard[][] CAH_Game.answers
      The Array of array lists of Cards played by each player that keeps track of who played what card The 2D aspect of it is to make it work for pick 2's and pick 3's

      void CAH_Game.seriousBuisnessPoints(AnswerCard[] first, AnswerCard[] second, AnswerCard[] third)
      Gives a different amount of points to the first(3 points), second(2 points), third (one point) in a HouseRules.SERIOUS_BUSINESS game.
